alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Jefferson (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued March 07 at 7:17PM EST until March 07 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 37 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MARYLAND THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MARYLAND HOWARD IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND CARROLL FREDERICK WASHINGTON IN NORTHEAST MARYLAND CECIL IN NORTHERN MARYLAND BALTIMORE BALTIMORE CITY HARFORD IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST VIRGINIA CITY OF WINCHESTER CLARKE FREDERICK IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN PANHANDLE WEST VIRGINIA BERKELEY JEFFERSON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABERDEEN, BALLENGER CREEK, BALTIMORE, BEL AIR, BERRYVILLE, CATONSVILLE, CHARLES TOWN, COLUMBIA, DUNDALK, EDGEWOOD, ELDERSBURG, ELKTON, ELLICOTT CITY, ESSEX, FALLSTON, FREDERICK, HAGERSTOWN, HAVRE DE GRACE, JOPPATOWNE, MARTINSBURG, PARKVILLE, PIKESVILLE, RANDALLSTOWN, SHEPHERDSTOWN, TOWSON, WESTMINSTER, WINCHESTER, AND WINCHESTER.
